name: Multiplatform Typography
description:
Typography for the following devices


  1. xs - Extra small < 576 px
  2. sm - Small >= 576 px
  3. md - Medium >= 768 px
  4. lg - Large >= 992 px - coming soon
  5. xl - Extra large >= 1200 px - coming soon
  6. xxl - Extra extra large >= 1400 px - coming soon
